item.description:
Free Music Event:
When: Tuesday, June 26, 2007 at 6:30
Where:New Britain Public Library 20 High St New Britain, CT 06051
860-224-3155
What: High Strung - a very good Indie-rock band, Beatle-esque with a garage rock twist has earned high praise. 2005 album "Moxie Bravo" was called a masterpiece by rock savant Robert Pollard (music reviewer).

The show is FREE! For more info call 860-224-3155.

Also, library is across the street from Walnut Hill Park so we might be able to do a walk and pot-luck dinner after. Some pretty good restaurants in New Britain, too.

Al, if you are busy, I can host this event - Betsy

Betsy will give info in the RSVP section on how to meet and get together, Look at her comments !

I am not familliar with this location

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Betsy's Concert Suggestion in New Britain CT
